title: The response of root-zone soil bacterial community, metabolites, and soil properties of Sanyeqing medicinal plant varieties to anthracnose disease in reclaimed land, China
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Xuqing Li, Qiujun Lu, Rahila Hafeez, Solabomi Olaitan Ogunyemi, Ezzeldin Ibrahim, Xiaoxu Ren, Zhongling Tian, Songlin Ruan, Mohamed Mohany, Salim S. Al-Rejaie, Bin Li, Jianli Yan
